title: What did Ibn Sirin say about seeing a black dress in a dream?

preview.html: The black dress in a dream: It symbolizes power and prestige, and it is said that wearing black in a dream is evidence of sadness and anxiety, even though the person in charge may bear a great responsibility. The black dress in a dream Wearing a black dress in a dream indicates money, position, and prestige, and perhaps the dream of wearing a black dress indicates Honor and power, if the dreamer is accustomed to wearing it in reality. Wearing a black dress in a dream for a married or unmarried woman, if there is no evidence of sadness and anxiety, it means purity and chastity. Sewing a black dress in a dream indicates reconciliation of differences and solving problems between them As for wearing a black dress in a dream to cover the parts of the body, it means staying away from falsehood, staying away from sins, and getting closer to God. And whoever sees in a dream someone wearing a black dress, he will receive a great promotion in his work from a sultan or a minister. The black dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin indicated. Sirin indicates that if a person wears black clothes in a dream, this is evidence that a great calamity will befall him that will cause him sadness and depression, if the person does not want to wear this color in reality. In the event that a person loves the color black and is accustomed to wearing it in a state of alert, Here the vision is considered a praiseworthy vision. Seeing a black dress in a dream is a cover for someone who is accustomed to wearing it, and a black dress in a man’s dream means prestige and success, and the black color shows jacket and purity. Whoever sees that he is erasing the black color from his surroundings with his own things or things, removes The black cloud is above him and he achieves all his desires and goals. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet on Google. The black dress in a single woman’s dream. It is possible to think about an unmarried girl who sees that she is wearing a black dress in a dream or that her furniture is black, and this is evidence that she will travel to a far country to achieve her dreams, and God will grant her success in this country. If the black dress in an unmarried woman’s dream increases her brilliance in the dream, this is evidence that she is confident in herself and that her personality is strong and she can impose it on everyone around her. Also, when an unmarried woman sees in a dream and there is a stranger who bought her a beautiful black dress and presented it to her Seeing the color black in a single woman’s dream is a symbol of her success in her studies. She will receive a number of academic certificates in recognition of her excellence. If an unmarried woman dreams of wearing black at a wedding, the dream indicates the misfortunes and tribulations that will befall her. The black dress in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself in a dream wearing a black dress, the dream indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about an open grave according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of an open grave in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, whether walking in the cemetery and seeing the open coffin, or digging the grave and opening it. Exhuming a body, or seeing a watery grave by Ibn Sirin and more interpretations in continuation of the topic below. Seeing an open grave in a dream makes the dreamer feel confused and anxious, so he searches online for its correct interpretation, and the vision may differ from one person to another and also varies according to time and place, today Through this article, we are presenting to you the interpretations of the greatest scholars and dream interpreters. Interpretation of an open grave in a dream: To see an open grave in a dream, which was newly created, means being exposed to distress and trouble for reasons that are not your own, but due to the actions of others. Visiting an open grave in a dream indicates There are some dangers hovering around you, so you should be careful. Whoever sees an open grave, this portends unpleasant news and a failed situation. If one sees that there is an open grave in a dream, this indicates material damage due to engaging in some lost business. An open grave in a dream indicates the possibility of injury. With some diseases Walking among graves in a dream and seeing an open grave indicates a failed marriage or death in youth. If you see that there is an empty grave in a dream, it means the loss of friends and a great disappointment that befalls you. If you see someone you know has come out of the grave in a dream, this means that this person has enmity. Hidden towards you, so you should beware of it. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a grave in a dream makes the fortuneteller tense and panic, and since the condition of the people of the graves and the grave is something that makes most people pessimistic, we provide a correct interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a divorced woman. And a man as well. Interpretation of the grave in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is visiting a grave and does not know who is dead inside, then this is evidence of the presence of a deceiver in this girl’s life and she will reveal it soon, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is visiting someone at If the married woman sees in a dream that she is crying over the grave and does not know who the deceased is, and her crying is weak, then this is evidence of this girl’s patience with... Her worries and problems, but everything will end soon. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is pointing to the grave, then this is evidence that she will pay her debts over her life, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the grave in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is crying over the grave and the sound of her crying is loud, then this is evidence of an easy birth, but she She and the baby will need care and attention, and she will give birth. A male child, and he will have a good relationship later. If a pregnant woman in a dream visits the grave without crying and does not know who the deceased is, this is evidence of kindness and livelihood on the way to her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about medicine by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing medicine. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing medicine in a dream as a sign of gaining useful knowledge. Drinking medicine to repair the body indicates the goodness of religion for the dreamer. If the medicine is drunk and its taste is bitter or bad, this indicates illness, but it will calm down. And seeing medicine In a dream, it is yellow in color, indicating a serious illness. The medicinal drink, which had an unpleasant taste, indicates a financial crisis and a need for money. Drinking the medicine easily in a dream without pain is evidence of recovery from the disease. Interpretation of a medical visit for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees the medicine, this Evidence of her proximity to a person of good character, and this is in the event that the medicine is sweet and pleasant to the taste. As you see the dream of sweet medicine, this indicates the problems that she faces during the marriage period and may indicate that it is about to end. Interpretation of a medical visit for a married woman. A married woman who sees sweet and sweet medicine In a dream, this indicates a good husband, a decent life, and love and affection between them. A visit to medicine may indicate the repayment of debts. Interpretation of a visit to medicine for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees medicine in a dream indicates a natural birth and may be a sign that God will bless her with a just and righteous child. Interpretation of taking medicine in a dream: Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing or buying medicine as a sign of evil or harm to the dreamer. Anyone who takes medicine from someone he knows indicates that the dreamer will enjoy money, influence, and power. As for giving medicine to someone you know, this indicates wasting money or Losing a loved one or a person. Interpretation of giving medicine to a dead person in a dream. Scholars’ explanation: Giving medicine to a dead person in a dream indicates the loss of a loved one, and this person is often old or suffering from some disease. But if he sees the dead person taking the medicine himself, or taking it himself, this is a sign of The mercy that he enjoys for his good deeds. Interpretation of buying medicine from a pharmacy in a dream: In general, the pharmacy in a dream symbolizes the government and administration, and buying medicines from the pharmacy in a dream is evidence of promotion in the field of work, obtaining a grant, compensation, gift, or obtaining a sum of money. Interpretation of consuming medicine for unmarried women. Interpretation of taking medicine. Single people have many interpretations, the most important of which is that this single person is waiting for good news. This life can change for the better, especially in social life, as if it heralds a happy marriage to someone you love. If this medicine has a sweet taste, this means that This single person lives a life full of happiness and pleasure. She may be on her way to developing her job and having a lot of money and growth in her career. Interpretation of requesting medicine in a dream Requesting medicine In a dream, this indicates the desire for a decent life, which comes through a happy marriage and a peaceful family life. Request Medicine is something that proves the presence of the disease and the desire to be treated by requesting medicine. It can be evidence of weakness and the desire to help, such as a patient who needs medicine.

title: Interpretation of winter in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: The Encyclopedia of Interpretation of Winter in a Dream presents you with one of the four seasons of the year when rain falls bringing relief from Almighty God to revive the earth and grow crops. At that time, the gates of Paradise are opened to send down rain and to raise the voices of supplication for those in need to answer the prayer of God Almighty who responds. God Almighty said in Surat Al-Shura, verse 28 (And it is He who sends down the rain after despair and spreads His mercy), and in the noble verse there is an indication that winter and rain contain mercy and are better. To see him in a state of confusion during his sleep, then this dream carries good meanings as it suggests winter in reality, or perhaps otherwise, this will be explained in detail in the following article. Interpretation of winter in a dream The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin gives the following interpretations about seeing winter in a dream: It symbolizes the dreamer’s good condition in his religion, morals, and worldly affairs. The damage to the land as a result of rain falling on it is a harbinger of disaster. Winter in a dream indicates the abundance of goodness and abundance in the dreamer’s life. Winter and autumn in a dream in the summer indicate the disaster that will occur in the area where The dreamer saw rain in it. Interpretation of seeing winter in a dream While Ibn Shaheen says about seeing winter in a dream the following interpretations: Light rain symbolizes bliss and nourishment, while heavy rain indicates distress and loss. Seeing the fall of winter and rain at the beginning of the year is good news for whoever sees that it will be A happy year with much goodness, comfort, and response to the prayers of God Almighty. Seeing a sick person bathing in winter water indicates a speedy recovery by God’s command. Washing with rain water symbolizes God Almighty’s acceptance of the dreamer’s worship and obedience, and if he is guilty, he will repent and God Almighty will accept his repentance. Winter in A dream for a single woman: Here are the following points, the interpretation of seeing winter in a dream for a single woman: Seeing it in a dream indicates the emergence of goodness and success in his academic and social life. An unmarried woman standing in a dream under the winter symbolizes obtaining a dream job or entering into a happy romantic relationship. If an unmarried woman or one of her family members is suffering from problems and adversities, then this dream is news of comfort and anxious death.Heavy rainfall in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes marriage to a generous and brave man. Interpretation of a dream about light rain. Light rain falling in a dream is a sign of news The good news that will come soon. And if the light snow that falls in the sky does not harm the fortune-teller, then it is wealth and livelihood blessed by God. Imam Al-Nabulsi says: The arrival of light winter and dew drops is good that saves from sorrows. The arrival of light winter in a man’s dream indicates that he He found the beautiful girl after years of searching and wishing. Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain: Heavy autumn and winter in a dream, but it does not cause loss and damage to the land, indicates the extent to which the dreamer has in terms of wealth and status in society. Heavy rains that cause losses, such as floods, symbolize Life difficulties and problems at work or money. It portends rain

title: Interpretation of childbirth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of childbirth in a dream: Does it bring good or bad? Seeing childbirth is one of the most famous visions in a dream, whether married or unmarried, of all types, natural or caesarean section. The vision carries many different expressions, but in general it is a sign of offspring, security, and changes in life as well, and through this article we will learn about the implications of this vision. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream Birth in a dream is an expression of goodness and good health, in addition to getting rid of crises and problems. In life. Lawyers believe that the dream of a girl being born is better than a boy. The girl in the dream expresses the new world and the good that will happen to the dreamer and a breakthrough in all aspects and affairs of life. Al-Nabulsi believes that the dream of the birth of a child in the patient’s dream is a bad omen and expresses the approaching condition, and for the sinner it is An expression of repentance, justice and direction in life in general. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing childbirth in a dream is a sign that he will soon hear good news about the man, if childbirth was easy for him, but if he feels extreme fatigue and unbearable pain, then this is a sign that he is living in it. Problem. Giving birth to girls in a dream is a good dream that indicates kindness, stability, and the opening of many doors of livelihood for him. Face. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a sudden, easy birth in a man’s dream is a sign. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a single woman. Seeing childbirth in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes the goodness that she will gain soon, and also expresses the beginning of a new life with much happiness and joy, as she saw the beauty of the new baby. If the girl is engaged, then it is a vision that promises her happiness. Celebrating a wedding soon and an easy birth for her is a symbol of comfort and freedom from all the worries and concerns of life in general. A difficult birth in an unmarried woman’s dream is an unpleasant vision and indicates sorrows and difficulties in life. However, if the face An ugly child is a warning to her about the husband with whom she will suffer a lot. Seeing an unmarried girl giving birth to a girl with a beautiful face means an increase in livelihood and an opportunity for promotion at work, in addition to success and excellence in academic life. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman giving birth in her dream represents Her husband’s abundant livelihood is from a lawful source, and if she is going through a financial crisis, this is a sign of paying off debts, especially if she sees that childbirth is easy. Without problems. Seeing the birth of a dead child in a wife’s dream is absolutely undesirable and expresses her separation from the husband, but if she is sick, this vision means that the illness will get worse for her. An easy birth without disturbance, according to jurists, is an expression of relief from a crisis Great in life and positive changes in the life of a married woman. As for childbirth without pain, she is strong and patient. Women. Seeing childbirth pain in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she is thinking negatively, which puts her in some problems. As for the inability to expel

title: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream: Rain is the condensation of water vapor that collects in the form of clouds and falls in the form of small drops. This vision, follow us. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream: Many dream interpreters say that seeing rain in a dream means a lot of good that will come to the dreamer and it is almost Comfort. If the dreamer sees rain falling on him in a dream, it gives him good news of a blessing in life and the return of the one who turned away from him. If a married woman dreams of rain falling from the sky, it portends a stable and trouble-free married life. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that Rain is falling on her, this gives her good news that she is approaching the date of her marriage to a suitable person for her. If a student sees heavy rain in a dream, he will achieve great success in his life. As for a man who sees rain in a dream, this means that he will win a prestigious job from which he will earn a lot of money. Money. If a debtor sees rain falling in a dream, he will be happy to see comfort and a lot of halal money soon. If a sick person sees in a dream that it is raining, this promises him a quick recovery and good health. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing Rain in a dream is a sign of comfort and relief from worries. If a woman sees heavy rain in a dream, this foretells her a very good and abundant diet that she will receive. If a woman sees her husband traveling and sees rain in a dream, this indicates the approaching date of his meeting and his return to her soon. If an unmarried girl sees heavy rain in a dream, this indicates that she will enter into a good emotional life and will be happy in the very near future. If a single person sees rain falling from the sky, it announces to him the superiority and brilliant success that he will achieve. If the dreamer sees rain falling heavily on his head This means that he suffers from a lack of self-confidence because of some people around him. Seeing heavy rain in a dream means getting rid of enemies and achieving victory over them. If the dreamer sees rain and the appearance of a rainbow in a dream, this means happy news and a stable life that he will enjoy. What is the interpretation? Seeing rain in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees rain in a dream, this portends a stable life and God will bless her with many different blessings and bless her with goodness. If the dreamer sees rain in a dream, this means that she will receive the highest promotions in her work and occupy high positions. Likewise, if the dreamer sees in a dream that she is walking in the rain, this gives her good and abundant nutrition and the emotional relationship that she will be happy with. As for the girl who sees rain in a dream during the day, this indicates the fulfillment of many aspirations and multiple ambitions. And the dreamer who sees in a dream that The sky is raining heavily, indicating that he is always working for the sake of God and walking on the straight path and the high morals that he enjoys. title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream laughing and talking 101 complete and correct interpretations

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream laughing and talking. Seeing a dead person in a dream is one of the visions that many people who have lost their loved ones are waiting for. The opportunity or to be able to see them for a moment, and hear their voices for the last time, is an impossible wish. Verification, because the dead do not return to life again, and seeing them in a dream heralds or warns of something happening, but what are the signs of the dead laughing in a dream? This is what we will learn today through the following article on the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream laughing and talking Joking with the dead is one of the most promising visions, as it indicates that the fortune teller will get a promotion in his work or that he will get a distinguished position in his work. Whoever suffers from problems in his life, and feels anxious and distressed, this dream foretells that he will hear good news in his life. Interpretation of a dream of fun with the dead Whoever has debts and suffers from financial crises and dreams that he is joking with the dead in a dream, this dream indicates that death will help him God in paying off his debts and getting rid of them. One of the bad visions is for a person to see in a dream that he is talking to a dead person and joking with him and exchanging jokes, and suddenly the face of the dead person becomes black and ugly. This dream indicates the poor condition of the deceased and that he died in a state of sin. Interpretation of seeing the deceased laughing in a dream for a single woman An unmarried girl sees the deceased in her dream and laughs at him with many interpretations, and these interpretations differ according to the dreamer's condition, as follows: A girl who suffers from worries and problems and is going through difficult times in her life that cause her sadness and misery. This dream is good news for her that these worries will end, God Almighty willing, and that the girl will hear the good news that will make her life happy. If the girl is engaged and sees the deceased laughing in a dream, this dream is good news that her wedding date is approaching, God willing. But if the girl is not close, this dream indicates that this girl will propose to one of the people she feels comfortable with and agree to be engaged to him. One of the good visions for a girl who is still in school is to see the deceased laughing in a dream. This vision indicates that she will achieve success and excellence, God willing, in her exams. It also indicates that he should study diligently and diligently, so that he feels the pleasure of success, and maintains excellence. Some interpreters say that the girl who sees a dead person in her dream indicates that this girl feels stable in her relationship with the person she loves. The unmarried girl who sees in her dream that the dead person kisses her smiling, this dream indicates that the dead person lives in bliss in the grave, and that he is in good health, God willing. Seeing the deceased laughing in a married woman’s dream A woman who suffers from problems in her marital life and saw that the dead person was laughing at her in her dream, this vision is one of the promising visions that show that this woman will be able to get rid of the problems in her life, and that her life will return to its previous nature full of optimism and happiness. If the wife has not yet been blessed with children, and she saw the dead person in her dream and this dead person was smiling

title: Interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream by Ibn Sirin 2021

preview.html: God Almighty mentioned the Sabbath in the Holy Qur’an when he told the story of the Jews who were practicing the fishing profession known as (the people of the Sabbath) and their attempt to deceive God Almighty and deceive anyone but God. They punish them with the harshest punishments by making their anger dirty and hateful. Therefore, it will provide a website on the Internet. Differences in the interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, with different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, it symbolizes the presence of deception, deception, or fraud in the life of the person who sees it and a reminder to him to seek refuge. To God and stay away from places of worship. Evil and deception. It is possible that the interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream is that the dreamer has some Jewish characteristics or that he is inclined towards the Jews and loves them. Also, seeing Saturday indicates that a holiday or temporary pause will occur in the dreamer's life and can be interpreted as the dreamer being subjected to fraud, deception, and deception. Seeing Saturday in a dream as Friday means that the dreamer is dealing with something in worldly matters. One of the interpretations of seeing Saturday in a dream is that it symbolizes a holiday or vacation in a person’s life and thinking about starting something new, such as starting a wedding, engagement, or special project. Interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream by Ibn Sirin about a manInterpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream according to Ibn Sirin for a man indicates that this person will start something new in his life.If the dreamer is single, this is good news that he will deal with engagement or marriage or will start a new job in His life. But if the dreamer gets married and sees Saturday in his dream, this is evidence that this man is deceiving or deceiving his wife. If a man sees Saturday in a dream, it indicates that it is Friday, and that he is preoccupied with worldly matters and far from matters of his religion. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about days of the week By Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreams about Saturday in a dream by Ibn Sirin for an unmarried womanIt has been mentioned in the interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream by Ibn Sirin about an unmarried woman that it indicates that this wise girl is cunning and deceitful. In other interpretations, it symbolizes the presence of rest in her work or on vacation. It likely shows her appetite for something new or different and is likely to bode well for her. Ibn Sirin mentioned that the best days that an unmarried woman sees in her dream are Monday, Thursday, and Friday. Interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream by Ibn Sirin about a married womanAfter we mentioned the interpretation of a dream Saturday in a dream by Ibn Sirin, we will also tell the interpretation of a dream about Saturday in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a married woman in a dream on Saturday indicates that this lady will deceive and be deceived. It is possible that the one who deceives the fortune-teller and deceives her is her husband, She must be cautious and careful. While others see in their interpretation that a married woman is evil and deceitful, this vision portends staying away from her. Interpretation of a dream about the days of the week in a dream by Ibn Sirin Helmchi

title: Interpretation of a dream about dead people by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person has many associations and meanings for dreamers and makes them eager to learn about it, and in the following article we will discuss the most important interpretations related to this topic. Let us read the following. What is the interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about a dead person: The conversation with the dreamer shows that he wants to tell him something very important, and therefore he must To be very careful about everything he says. If one sees in his dream a dead person giving him something, this is a sign of the abundant blessings he will receive in his life as a result of fearing God (the Most High) in all his actions. If the dreamer sees in his dream a dead person moving in the air, this is It indicates the bad rumors that are spreading about him because he did not do his good deeds that were mentioned after his death. The dreamer seeing in a dream about the deceased in good condition means the good news that he will receive in the coming days and will make him very happy. Interpretation of a dream about the dead by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees in Dreaming of a dead person dying again without crying over him is evidence of his presence on a happy occasion that belongs to someone close to him. If someone dreams of a dead person dying and crying over him, this is a sign that he has overcome a difficult problem that he has been dealing with for a long time. If the dreamer sees during his sleep a dead person In a very bad situation, this expresses despair over the problems he suffers from that prevent him from feeling comfortable. Seeing a silent dead person in a dream symbolizes his ability to achieve many things he dreamed of and this will make him very happy. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person for a single woman: Seeing An unmarried woman in a dream about his death and he was alive means that she will enjoy a period filled with many things that will make her very satisfied with herself. If the dreamer during his sleep sees the dead coming back to life, this indicates that there are many changes that will occur in her life that will make her happy Extremely. If the dreamer sees a dead person crying in his dream, this is a sign of his intense need for someone to invite him to prayer and believe in his name to alleviate his suffering. For a girl to see a dead person in her dream means that she is very worried about what will happen in her life in the coming days and is afraid that things will not go in her favor. What is the interpretation of a vision? A dead person in a dream for a married woman? Interpretation of a dream about a dead woman for a married woman: It indicates that she is coming to a period that will be filled with many changes in many aspects of her life and will be very rewarding for her. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that the dead person comes back to life, this is a sign of the abundant blessings that she will enjoy. In her life in the coming days because it is good. If the dreamer sees the deceased in his dream and kisses his hand, this means that her husband has received a very important promotion at his workplace that will greatly improve their living conditions. A woman’s dream of seeing the dead alive symbolizes the good news that It will reach her ears and spread joy and happiness around her. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with her deceased mother indicates that at that time she is preparing to give birth and feels great excitement to meet him. If the dreamer sees during her sleep the dead father

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about buying new clothes for a divorced woman?

preview.html: The vision of a divorced woman dreaming of buying new clothes indicates a lot of happiness in her life, and there is no doubt that she went through some harsh circumstances that made her in a state of psychological injury, so when she dreams of this promising dream, she gets out of all the painful feelings between us. Not happy when buying new clothes, so we find that there are many important interpretations of this dream, we will understand it through the interpretations of the majority of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about buying new clothes for a divorced woman What is the interpretation of a dream about buying new clothes for a divorced woman? Seeing this dream means that she will enter a new stage that makes her happy and compensates her for all the evil she saw before. It also expresses that she lived her life the way she wanted, so she was overcome by happiness that she had not seen before. Perhaps the vision indicates that she will marry another man who will compensate her for everything she saw in her previous life, and she will love her very much because of the good morals and qualities that distinguish her from any other woman. This vision is evidence of the intense joy that she sees in her life in the coming periods, as this dream is good news that she will reach all her desires in the future and will not return to problems again. If the divorced woman sees this dream, it is an expression of her exit from her crises and sorrows without return and that she will find the right path that brings her happiness in her next life. If he expects important news these days, he will be happy to hear it at the first opportunity. It may be marriage, travel, or even a promotion, so the vision expresses joy and satisfaction. The dream has happy meanings for divorcees, and there is no doubt that she is going through a period of her divorce feeling despair and brokenness, but we find that the vision portends the disappearance of this feeling and its replacement with everything that is happy and joyful for her. If she sees the clothes and they are new but torn, this leads to a heartache that does not leave her no matter how hard she tries to take them off, but she should not give up and try again until she gets what she wants. Perhaps the vision indicates that the person is approaching the desire to marry her, and this person is characterized by the material ability and high morals that every woman desires. The beauty of clothes in a dream is evidence of the beauty of her life in all its aspects, and as for the poor appearance of the clothes, even if they are new, this leads to the difficult circumstances that this woman is exposed to, but she does not. It does not last, but he tries to change it in different ways. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type the Egyptian dream interpretation site. What is the interpretation of a dream about buying new clothes for a divorced woman according to Ibn Sirin? Our scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing this dream is a sign of happiness, joy and happiness. The vision is compensation for all the sorrow and injustice that she experienced before, so she feels that the next vision is much better than the previous one. The vision shows her tolerant morals and her love for good for everyone around her without harming them, so she finds that her Lord helps her to reach everything she wants without living in sadness again. If he has been looking forward to fulfilling a wish for a while and saw this dream, he should know that this desire will be fulfilled immediately and that he will not wait any longer. The vision also reflects the
